text: Good day, have you heard of a charity by the name Save the Children?
Yes I have. Do you donate to this organization?
I donate when I am able to, I need to secure donations from others before I am able to make that decision myself
How much would you be willing to donate to this organization if you could?
assuming I make 2 dollars, I would like to donate at least 1 dollar
I would like that. Would you be willing get to donate that now?
In order for me to donate I would need to know how much you would like to donate.
I also would donate 1 dollar to this organization.
To be clear, this dollar would come out of your task payment. Would you still choose to make that donation knowing this?
Yes I would but only if you will donate the same amount.  Are you willing to this?
Yes, I would be happy to do so. If you were given the choice, what would you like this to go towards?
Save the children organization. Is this the one you would like to donate to also?
This is the organization yes, but what I meant is if there was anything specific you would like that donation to help with?
I'm sorry I would like my donation to go to the children who were abused. How about you what would you like tour portion of the donation to go for?
I'd like for it to go towards refugee housing. My goal is for the donation to help as many people as possible
That also sounds good. I would be willing to split up my donation to support both of them. How about you?
If you were willing to donate $1.50, I'd donate as much. Then I'd be willing to support both. That way it's more of a substantial donation for both.
I would be willing to do that also. I want help as many people I can also. Can we both commit to this amount to donate?
I would be willing to commit to us both donating $1.50
I am willing to do that too let both donate $1.50.
